text: Prakash Yashwant Ambedkar (born 10 May 1954), also known as Adv. Balasaheb Ambedkar, is an Indian politician, lawyer and social activist. He became Member of Parliament of India (MP) three times, two times in Lok Sabha and one time in Rajya Sabha.http://rajyasabha.nic.in/rsnew/pre_member/1952_2003/a.pdf He is the grandson of Babasaheb Ambedkar, the father of the Indian constitution. He is the founder and the president of political party called the Vanchit Bahujan Aghadi. ==References== Category:Politicians from Maharashtra Category:Ambedkarites Category:Indian lawyers Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Prakash Ambedkar
